post.description: This operation triggers when there are newly created or modified records of the selected object

object.description: Select an object that triggers this operation
object.title: Object

post.summary: When a record is created or modified

id.description: ID of the record that was created or modified. Use with the corresponding 'Get' action to fetch the content of the record
id.title: ID

post.description: This operation triggers when a record of the selected object is deleted

object.description: Select an object that triggers this operation
object.title: Object

id.description: ID of the record that was deleted
id.title: ID

post.description: This operation triggers when there are newly created records of the selected object

object.description: Select an object that triggers this operation
object.title: Object

id.description: ID of the record that was created. Use with the corresponding 'Get' action to fetch the content of the record
id.title: ID

post.description: This operation triggers when there are modified records of the selected object

object.description: Select an object that triggers this operation
object.title: Object

id.description: ID of the record that was modified. Use with the corresponding 'Get' action to fetch the content of the record
id.title: ID
